FuncDef:
The service-type command sets the access type for a local access user.
The undo service-type command restores the default access type for a local access user. The service-type command sets the access type for a local access user. The undo service-type command restores the default access type for a local access user. By default, a local access user cannot use any access type. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
